content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I was commanded to google nuclear propulsion for interstellar travel and found several relevant links, including NASA's NIAC-funded studies, IAEA's report on nuclear technology for future space missions, and articles on interplanetary spaceflight, space colonization, and mining in space. My computer returned a list of links related to nuclear propulsion for interstellar travel, including NASA's testing of a nuclear engine for future Mars missions, the use of nuclear technology to propel and power future space missions, and research on interstellar spaceflight using nuclear propulsion and advanced techniques.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "space mining for interstellar travel"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command google returned: ["https://www.space.com/19388-asteroid-mining-interstellar-flight.html", "https://www.nbcnews.com/mach/space/next-frontier-space-miners-are-universe-s-future-tycoons-n698711", "https://www.foxnews.com/tech/china-plans-asteroid-base-for-interstellar-travel-and-mining", "https://news.com.au/technology/science/space/china-plans-asteroid-base-for-interstellar-travel-and-mining/news-story/00e9cd1bcab89f2736734074a602ea47", "https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Asteroid_mining", "https://www.cnbc.com/2016/12/26/the-next-frontier-space-miners-are-the-universes-future-tycoons.html", "https://eandt.theiet.org/content/articles/2017/05/interstellar-travel-forms-part-of-campaign-pledge-for-ukip-mp-candidate/", "https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Self-replicating_spacecraft"]', type='action_result')]
"""
